data.title: South Korea's opposition moves to impeach President Yoon over martial law
data.description: “President Yoon Suk Yeol’s martial law declaration was a clear violation of the constitution. It didn’t abide by any requirements to declare it,” the Democratic Party said in a statement.

data.title: Diesel, food price hikes push Thailand’s headline inflation by 0.95%
data.description: The Commerce Ministry expects inflation to continue rising in December, partly due to economic growth, higher fuel prices and increased spending after government handouts

data.title: River City Bangkok celebrates four decades shaping the Thai art scene
data.description: The “River City Bangkok: 40 Years of Magnificent Display of Art and Antiques” allows visitors to discover timeless treasures, artistic marvels and the rich tapestry of the iconic centre for art and culture that has played a pivotal role in shaping the Thai art scene for four decades.

data.title: Thai govt mulls VAT increase as part of tax reform plans
data.description: Finance minister reckons increasing VAT from current 7% rate will boost revenue and address the income inequality problem

data.title: UNESCO: Kebaya, an intangible cultural heritage
data.description: A garment noted for its complex design and elegance, the kebaya is due to earn  intangible cultural heritage status from UNESCO

data.title: Is Boonsong’s release from prison a precursor to Yingluck’s return?
data.description: Freeing of key figures sentenced in rice scandal points to implementation of Thaksin’s timeline

data.title: Funeral held for drowned Russian yoga 'influencer'
data.description: A funeral ceremony for a Russian woman swept out to sea while practising yoga sitting on a seaside rock last week was held on Koh Samui on Wednesday.

data.title: Same-sex marriages can be registered nationwide from Jan 22
data.description: Deputy interior minister says district offices nationwide are ready to register same-sex couples from the minute the law is promulgated

data.title: Boonsong reports to Chiang Mai probation office after parole release
data.description: Ex-minister’s son says his father will be required to inform probation officers well in advance if he goes to Bangkok for treatment

data.title: Lao Bullion Bank CEO reveals shareholder structure as bank launches
data.description: Chanthone Sitthixay stresses that his family and the government of Lao PDR are the sole shareholders and that no Chinese financing is involved

data.title: Nation Foundation, CIB provide school uniforms to students on Koh Libong
data.description: Sports equipment also delivered to school in Trang district

data.title: Brit arrested for alleged rape of 6-year-old stepdaughter
data.description: A Briton has been arrested in Pattaya for allegedly  raping his 6-year-old Thai stepdaughter  after  UK authorities  asked Thai police to  investigate a video  posted on social media.

data.title: Suvarnabhumi’s SAT-1 wins UNESCO special prize for its exterior
data.description: Suvarnabhumi Airport’s Satellite Terminal 1 (SAT-1) has been awarded a UNESCO special prize this year for its exterior by Prix Versailles, which honours exceptional accomplishments in global architecture and design, according to the Airports of Thailand (AOT) on Wednesday.

data.title: Giant monkeys join sunflowers at Lopburi’s new landmark
data.description: Wanon Ranch has combined the province’s two iconic natural wonders to create a unique and selfie-friendly destination in central Thailand

data.title: GreenYellow, Unilever Drive 1,500-Ton Carbon Reduction
data.description: GreenYellow (Thailand) Co.,Ltd., a leading provider of solar energy solutions, specialising in solar power production and energy efficiency enhancement, and Unilever, one of the world

data.title: Kindness Launches Sunscreens for Every Lifestyle Need
data.description: Kindness, a Thai beauty brand founded by two visionary entrepreneurs, has unveiled three new Freedom Sunscreen formulas to meet the rising demand for health-conscious, eco-friendly beauty solutions. Known for their Clean Beauty ethos, Kindness products are crafted using advanced innovation to create skincare that is safe, free from irritants, and suitable for sensitive skin, addressing a variety of skincare needs.

data.title: Bangkok’s air quality deteriorates to health-risk levels
data.description: With PM2.5 pollution levels reaching the orange zone, BMA has advised residents to wear PM2.5-proof masks and limit outdoor activities

data.title: Illustration fair returns to CentralWorld
data.description: The Bangkok Illustration Fair is back with works by Thai and foreign illustrators at CentralWorld Live, 8th floor of CentralWorld, Ratchadamri Road, from tomorrow to Sunday.
